tasks.instructions: You should spend about 20 minutes on this task. The charts below show the percentage of household income spent on four categories (Food, Housing, Health Care, and Entertainment) in two countries (Country A and Country B) in 2000 and 2020. Summarize the information by selecting and reporting the main features, and make comparisons where relevant.

You should spend about 40 minutes on this task. Some people believe that schools should focus on teaching practical skills, such as money management and job-related training. Others argue that academic subjects like mathematics and literature are more important for students’ long-term development. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
